name: Composite Joe: Bottom of the Barrel
name_original: Composite Joe: Bottom of the Barrel
description:
Composite Joe: Bottom of the Barrel is a side-scrolling 2D metroidvania where you can move, jump, shoot and draw your way through.

Project created for the Metroidvania Month Jam 15

  • Draw your own platforms! Experience free-form movement and cover system
  • Three totally different weapons to plow your way through ferocious enemies
  • Navigate a bizarre world full of hazards and strange creatures

 STILL IN DEVELOPMENT 
This game will be updated soon after the Metroidvania Month Jam

 

Controls:

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
W/Space Bar - Jump
Q - Change Drawing Material
1/2/3 - Change Weapon Equipped
Mouse Left Click or Hold - Shoot
Mouse Right Click or Hold - Draw

Weapon Controls:

Revolver: Tap to shoot & hold to burst.

 Shootgun: Tap to load bullets & double tap to shoot.

 Machinegun: Hold to shoot like the devil.
